00051 (FormWidgetUi, FormWidgetBase) = loadUiType( Common.uiPath('formcontainer.ui') )

00053 class FormWidget( QWidget, FormWidgetUi ):
00054         # form constructor:
00055         # model -> Name of the model the form should handle
00056         # res_id -> List of ids of type 'model' to load
00057         # domain -> Domain the models should be in
00058         # view_type -> type of view: form, tree, graph, calendar, ...
00059         # view_ids -> Id's of the views 'ir.ui.view' to show
00060         # context -> Context for the current data set
00061         # parent -> Parent widget of the form
00062         # name -> User visible title of the form
00063         def __init__(self, model, res_id=False, domain=None, view_type=None, view_ids=None, context=None, parent=None, name=False):
00064                 QWidget.__init__(self,parent)
00065                 FormWidgetUi.__init__(self)
00066                 self.setupUi( self )
00067 
00068                 if domain is None:
00069                         domain = []
00070                 if view_ids is None:
00071                         view_ids = []
00072                 if context is None:
00073                         context = {}
00074 
00075                 # Workaround: In some cases (detected in some CRM actions) view_type and view_ids
00076                 # may contain duplicate entries. Here we remove duplicates (ensuring lists order is kept).
00077                 if view_type:
00078                         new_view_ids = []
00079                         new_view_type = []
00080                         for i in xrange(len(view_type)):
00081                                 if not view_type[i] in new_view_type:
00082                                         if i < len(view_ids):
00083                                                 new_view_ids.append( view_ids[i] )
00084                                         new_view_type.append( view_type[i] )
00085                         view_ids = new_view_ids
00086                         view_type = new_view_type
00087 
00088                 if not view_type:
00089                         view_type = ['form','tree']
00090                 else:
00091                         if view_type[0] in ['graph'] and not res_id:
00092                                 res_id = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', model, 'search', domain)
00093                 fields = {}
00094                 self.model = model
00095                 self.previousAction = None
00096                 self.fields = fields
00097                 self.domain = domain
00098                 self.context = context
00099                 self.viewTypes = view_type
00100                 self.viewIds = view_ids
00101 
00102                 self._switchViewMenu = QMenu( self )
00103                 self._viewActionGroup = QActionGroup( self )
00104                 self._viewActionGroup.setExclusive( True )
00105                 for view in self.viewTypes:
00106                         action = ViewFactory.viewAction( view, self )
00107                         if not action:
00108                                 continue
00109                         self.connect( action, SIGNAL('triggered()'), self.switchView )
00110                         self._switchViewMenu.addAction( action )
00111                         self._viewActionGroup.addAction( action )
00112 
00113                 self.group = RecordGroup( self.model, context=self.context )
00114                 if Settings.value('sort_mode') == 'visible_items':
00115                         self.group.setSortMode( RecordGroup.SortVisibleItems )
00116                 self.group.setDomain( domain )
00117                 self.connect(self.group, SIGNAL('modified()'), self.notifyRecordModified)
00118 
00119                 self.screen.setRecordGroup( self.group )
00120                 self.screen.setEmbedded( False )
00121                 self.connect( self.screen, SIGNAL('activated()'), self.switchToForm )
00122                 self.connect( self.screen, SIGNAL('currentChanged()'), self.updateStatus )
00123                 self.connect( self.screen, SIGNAL('closed()'), self.closeWidget )
00124                 self.connect( self.screen, SIGNAL('recordMessage(int,int,int)'), self.updateRecordStatus )
00125                 self.connect( self.screen, SIGNAL('statusMessage(QString)'), self.updateStatus )
00126 
00127                 self._allowOpenInNewWindow = True
00128 
00129                 # Remove ids with False value
00130                 self.screen.setupViews( view_type, view_ids )
00131 
00132 
00133                 if name:
00134                         self.name = name
00135                 else:
00136                         self.name = self.screen.currentView().title
00137 
00138                 self.handlers = {
00139                         'New': self.new,
00140                         'Save': self.save,
00141                         'Export': self.export,
00142                         'Import': self.import_,
00143                         'Delete': self.remove,
00144                         'Find': self.search,
00145                         'Previous': self.previous,
00146                         'Next':  self.next,
00147                         'GoToResourceId':  self.goto,
00148                         'AccessLog':  self.showLogs,
00149                         'Reload': self.reload,
00150                         'Switch': self.switchView,
00151                         'Attach': self.showAttachments,
00152                         'Duplicate': self.duplicate,
00153                         'MassiveUpdate': self.massiveUpdate,
00154                         'StoreViewSettings': self.storeViewSettings,
00155                 }
00156 
00157                 if res_id:
00158                         if isinstance(res_id, int):
00159                                 res_id = [res_id]
00160                         self.screen.load(res_id)
00161                 else:
00162                         if len(view_type) and view_type[0]=='form':
00163                                 self.screen.new()
00164 
00165                 self.updateSwitchView()
00166 
00167                 self.reloadTimer = QTimer(self)
00168                 self.connect( self.reloadTimer, SIGNAL('timeout()'), self.autoReload )
00169                 self.pendingReload = False
00170 
00171                 # We always use the Subscriber as the class itself will handle
00172                 # whether the module exists on the server or not
00173                 self.subscriber = Rpc.Subscriber(Rpc.session, self)
00174                 if Settings.value('auto_reload'):
00175                         self.subscriber.subscribe( 'updated_model:%s' % model, self.autoReload )
00176 
00177         def notifyRecordModified(self):
00178                 self.updateStatus( _('<font color="blue">Document modified</font>') )
00179 
00180         ## @brief Establishes that every value seconds a reload should be scheduled.
00181         # If value is < 0 only Subscription based reloads are executed. Note that if
00182         # value is != 0 Subscription based reloads are always used if available.
00183         def setAutoReload(self, value):
00184                 if value:
00185                         # We use both, timer and subscriber as in some cases information may change
00186                         # only virtually: Say change the color of a row depending on current time.
00187                         # If the value is negative we don't start the timer but keep subscription,
00188                         # so this allows setting -1 in autorefresh when you don't want timed updates
00189                         # but only when data is changed in the server.
00190                         if value > 0:
00191                                 self.reloadTimer.start( int(value) * 1000 )
00192                         if not Settings.value('auto_reload'):
00193                                 # Do not subscribe again if that was already done in the constructor
00194                                 self.subscriber.subscribe( 'updated_model:%s' % self.model, self.autoReload )
00195                 else:
00196                         self.reloadTimer.stop()
00197 
00198         def setAllowOpenInNewWindow( self, value ):
00199                 self._allowOpenInNewWindow = value
00200 
00201         def goto(self):
00202                 if not self.modifiedSave():
00203                         return
00204                 dialog = GoToIdDialog( self )
00205                 if dialog.exec_() == QDialog.Rejected:
00206                         return
00207                 self.screen.load( [dialog.result] )
00208                 
00209         def setStatusBarVisible(self, value):
00210                 self.uiStatusLabel.setVisible( value )
00211                 self.uiStatus.setVisible( value )
00212                 self.uiRecordStatus.setVisible( value )
00213                 
00214         def showAttachments(self):
00215                 id = self.screen.currentId()
00216                 if id:
00217                         if Settings.value('attachments_dialog'):
00218                                 QApplication.setOverrideCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00219                                 try:
00220                                         window = AttachmentDialog(self.model, id, self)
00221                                         self.connect( window, SIGNAL('destroyed()'), self.attachmentsClosed )
00222                                 except Rpc.RpcException, e:
00223                                         QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00224                                         return
00225                                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00226                                 window.show()
00227                         else:
00228                                 context = self.context.copy()
00229                                 context.update(Rpc.session.context)
00230                                 action = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', 'ir.attachment', 'action_get', context)
00231                                 action['domain'] = [('res_model', '=', self.model), ('res_id', '=', id)]
00232                                 context['default_res_model'] = self.model
00233                                 context['default_res_id'] = id
00234                                 Api.instance.executeAction( action, {}, context )
00235                 else:
00236                         self.updateStatus(_('No resource selected !'))
00237 
00238         def attachmentsClosed(self):
00239                 self.updateStatus()
00240 
00241         def switchToForm(self):
00242                 if 'form' in self.viewTypes:
00243                         self.switchView( 'form' )
00244                 else:
00245                         self.switchView()
00246 
00247         def switchView(self, viewType=None):
00248                 if not self.modifiedSave():
00249                         return
00250                 QApplication.setOverrideCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00251                 try:
00252                         if ( self._allowOpenInNewWindow and QApplication.keyboardModifiers() & Qt.ControlModifier ) == Qt.ControlModifier:
00253                                 if QApplication.keyboardModifiers() & Qt.ShiftModifier:
00254                                         target = 'background'
00255                                 else:
00256                                         target = 'current'
00257                                 Api.instance.createWindow( None, self.model, [self.screen.currentId()], 
00258                                         view_type='form', mode='form,tree', target=target)
00259                         else:
00260                                 sender = self.sender()
00261                                 name = unicode( sender.objectName()  )
00262                                 if isinstance(sender, QAction) and name != 'actionSwitch':
00263                                         self.sender().setChecked( True )
00264                                         self.screen.switchView( name )
00265                                 else:
00266                                         self.screen.switchView( viewType )
00267                         if self.pendingReload:
00268                                 self.reload()
00269                         self.updateSwitchView()
00270                 except Rpc.RpcException, e:
00271                         pass
00272                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00273 
00274         def showLogs(self):
00275                 id = self.screen.currentId()
00276                 if not id:
00277                         self.updateStatus(_('You have to select one resource!'))
00278                         return False
00279                 res = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', self.model, 'perm_read', [id])
00280                 message = ''
00281                 for line in res:
00282                         todo = [
00283                                 ('id', _('ID')),
00284                                 ('create_uid', _('Creation User')),
00285                                 ('create_date', _('Creation Date')),
00286                                 ('write_uid', _('Latest Modification by')),
00287                                 ('write_date', _('Latest Modification Date')),
00288                         ]
00289                         for (key,val) in todo:
00290                                 if line[key] and key in ('create_uid','write_uid'):
00291                                         line[key] = line[key][1]
00292                                 message += val + ': ' + str(line[key] or '-') + '\n'
00293                 QMessageBox.information(self, _('Record log'), message)
00294 
00295         def remove(self):
00296                 value = QMessageBox.question(self,_('Question'),_('Are you sure you want to remove these records?'),QMessageBox.Yes|QMessageBox.No)
00297                 if value == QMessageBox.Yes:
00298                         QApplication.setOverrideCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00299                         try: 
00300                                 if not self.screen.remove(unlink=True):
00301                                         self.updateStatus(_('Resource not removed !'))
00302                                 else:
00303                                         self.updateStatus(_('Resource removed.'))
00304                         except Rpc.RpcException, e:
00305                                 pass
00306                         QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00307 
00308         def import_(self):
00309                 dialog = ImportDialog(self)
00310                 dialog.setModel( self.model )
00311                 dialog.setup( self.viewTypes, self.viewIds )
00312                 dialog.exec_()
00313                 if not self.screen.isModified():
00314                         self.reload()
00315 
00316         def export(self):
00317                 dialog = ExportDialog(self)
00318                 dialog.setModel( self.model )
00319                 dialog.setIds( self.screen.selectedIds() )
00320                 dialog.setup( self.viewTypes, self.viewIds )
00321                 dialog.exec_()
00322 
00323         def new(self):
00324                 if not self.modifiedSave():
00325                         return
00326                 self.screen.new()
00327         
00328         def duplicate(self):
00329                 if not self.modifiedSave():
00330                         return
00331                 res_id = self.screen.currentId()
00332                 new_id = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', self.model, 'copy', res_id, {}, Rpc.session.context)
00333                 self.screen.load( [new_id], self.screen.addOnTop() )
00334                 self.updateStatus(_('<font color="orange">Working now on the duplicated document</font>'))
00335 
00336         def save(self):
00337                 if not self.screen.currentRecord():
00338                         return
00339                 QApplication.setOverrideCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00340                 try:
00341                         modification = self.screen.currentRecord().id
00342                         id = self.screen.save()
00343                         if id:
00344                                 self.updateStatus(_('<font color="green">Document saved</font>'))
00345                                 if not modification and Settings.value('auto_new'):
00346                                         self.screen.new()
00347                         else:
00348                                 self.updateStatus(_('<font color="red">Invalid form</font>'))
00349                 except Rpc.RpcException, e:
00350                         id = False
00351                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00352                 return bool(id)
00353 
00354         def previous(self):
00355                 if not self.modifiedSave():
00356                         return
00357                 QApplication.setOverrideCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00358                 try:
00359                         self.screen.displayPrevious()
00360                         self.updateStatus()
00361                 except Rpc.RpcException, e:
00362                         pass
00363                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00364 
00365         def next(self):
00366                 if not self.modifiedSave():
00367                         return
00368                 QApplication.setOverrideCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00369                 try:
00370                         self.screen.displayNext()
00371                         self.updateStatus()
00372                 except Rpc.RpcException, e:
00373                         pass
00374                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00375 
00376         def autoReload(self):
00377                 # Do not reload automatically if it's an editable list
00378                 # By explicitly disallowing this it makes the global 
00379                 # koo module auto_reload option to be usable.
00380                 if self.screen.currentView().showsMultipleRecords() and not self.screen.currentView().isReadOnly():
00381                         return
00382                 # Do not reload automatically if there are any modified records
00383                 # However, we take note that there's a pending reload which 
00384                 # will be done in the next switchView()
00385                 if self.screen.isModified():
00386                         self.pendingReload = True
00387                         return
00388                 self.reload()
00389                 # If current view only shows one record self.screen.reload() 
00390                 # only reloads the current record. As we want to be sure that
00391                 # any new records will appear in the list view (or any view that 
00392                 # shows multiple records), we set pendingReload to be run
00393                 # when switching view.
00394                 if not self.screen.currentView().showsMultipleRecords():
00395                         self.pendingReload = True
00396 
00397         def reload(self):
00398                 QApplication.setOverrideCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00399                 try:
00400                         self.screen.reload()
00401                         self.updateStatus()
00402                         self.pendingReload = False
00403                 except Rpc.RpcException, e:
00404                         pass
00405                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00406 
00407         def cancel(self):
00408                 QApplication.setOverrideCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00409                 try:
00410                         self.screen.cancel()
00411                         self.updateStatus()
00412                 except Rpc.RpcException, e:
00413                         pass
00414                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00415 
00416         def search(self):
00417                 if not self.modifiedSave():
00418                         return
00419                 dom = self.domain
00420                 dialog = SearchDialog(self.model, domain=self.domain, context=self.context, parent=self)
00421                 if dialog.exec_() == QDialog.Rejected:
00422                         return
00423                 self.screen.clear()
00424                 self.screen.load( dialog.result )
00425 
00426         def updateStatus(self, message=''):
00427                 if self.model and self.screen.currentRecord() and self.screen.currentRecord().id:
00428                         ids=Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', 'ir.attachment', 'search', [('res_model','=',self.model),('res_id','=',self.screen.currentRecord().id)])
00429                 else:
00430                         ids = []
00431                 message = ( _("(%s attachments) ") % len(ids) ) + message
00432                 self.uiStatus.setText( message )
00433 
00434         def updateSwitchView(self):
00435                 for action in self._viewActionGroup.actions():
00436                         if action.objectName() == self.screen.currentView().viewType():
00437                                 action.setChecked( True )
00438                                 break
00439 
00440         def updateRecordStatus(self, position, count, value):
00441                 if not count:
00442                         msg = _('No records')
00443                 else:
00444                         pos = '_'
00445                         if position >= 0:
00446                                 pos = str(position+1)
00447                         if value == None:
00448                                 # Value will be None only when it's called by the constructor
00449                                 edit = _('No document selected')
00450                         else:
00451                                 # Other times it'll either be 0 (new document) or the appropiate
00452                                 # object i
00453                                 edit = _('New document')
00454                                 if value > 0:
00455                                         edit = _('Editing document (id: %s)') % str(value)
00456                         msg = _('Record: %(name)s / %(count)s - %(name2)s') % { 'name': pos, 'count': str(count), 'name2': edit }
00457 
00458                 self.uiRecordStatus.setText( msg )
00459 
00460         def modifiedSave(self):
00461                 if self.screen.isModified():
00462                         value = QMessageBox.question( self, _('Question'), _('This record has been modified do you want to save it?'), QMessageBox.Save | QMessageBox.Discard | QMessageBox.Cancel )
00463                         if value == QMessageBox.Save:
00464                                 return self.save()
00465                         elif value == QMessageBox.Discard:
00466                                 self.cancel()
00467                                 return True
00468                         else:
00469                                 return False
00470                 else:
00471                         # If a new record was created but not modified, isModified() will return
00472                         # False but we want to cancel new records anyway.
00473                         # We call screen.cancel() directly as we don't want to trigger an updateStatus()
00474                         # which will result in a server request.
00475                         self.screen.cancel()
00476                 return True
00477 
00478         def massiveUpdate(self):
00479                 if not self.screen.selectedIds():
00480                         QMessageBox.information( self, _('No records selected'), _('No records selected') )
00481                         return
00482                 dialog = MassiveUpdateDialog( self )
00483                 dialog.setIds( self.screen.selectedIds() )
00484                 dialog.setModel( self.model )
00485                 dialog.setContext( self.context )
00486                 dialog.setup( self.viewTypes, self.viewIds )
00487                 dialog.exec_()
00488                 self.reload()
00489 
00490         def storeViewSettings(self):
00491                 self.screen.storeViewSettings()
00492 
00493         def closeWidget(self):
00494                 self.screen.storeViewSettings()
00495                 self.reloadTimer.stop()
00496                 self.subscriber.unsubscribe()
00497                 self.emit( SIGNAL('closed()') )
00498 
00499         def canClose(self, urgent=False):
00500                 # Store settings of all opened views before closing the tab.
00501                 self.screen.storeViewSettings()
00502                 if self.modifiedSave():
00503                         # Here suppose that if we return True the form/tab will
00504                         # actually be closed, so stop reload timer so it doesn't
00505                         # remain active if the object is freed.
00506                         self.reloadTimer.stop()
00507                         self.subscriber.unsubscribe()
00508                         return True
00509                 else:
00510                         return False
00511 
00512         def actions(self):
00513                 return self.screen.actions
00514 
00515         def switchViewMenu(self):
00516                 return self._switchViewMenu
00517 
00518         def __del__(self):
00519                 print "DEL FORMWIDGET"
00520                 self.group.__del__()
00521                 del self.group
